results.title: Letter to Jane
results.brief_description: The film’s subject is a photograph of Jane Fonda visiting Hanoi during the Vietnam War. It asks what the position of the intellectual should be in the class struggle and points out the irony of Jane Fonda’s participation in the photo shoot, which was staged.

constellations_other.name: Film-truth
constellations_other.description: The experimental documentary Man with a Movie Camera has had a lasting impact on the development of film styles.

results.description: The film’s subject is a photograph of Jane Fonda visiting Hanoi during the Vietnam War. It asks what the position of the intellectual should be in the class struggle and points out the irony of Jane Fonda’s participation in the photo shoot, which was staged.

results.title: Léon: The Professional
results.headline_credit: France and United States of America, 1994
results.brief_description: Léon, the top hit man in New York, has earned a rep as an effective “cleaner”. But when his next-door neighbors are wiped out by a loose-cannon DEA agent, he becomes the unwilling custodian of 12-year-old Mathilda.

constellations_other.name: Film firsts
constellations_other.description: The early days of cinema were an exciting period of experimentation, with many inventors racing to come up with their own moving-image devices.

results.description: Léon, the top hit man in New York, has earned a rep as an effective “cleaner”. But when his next-door neighbors are wiped out by a loose-cannon DEA agent, he becomes the unwilling custodian of 12-year-old Mathilda. Before long, Mathilda’s thoughts turn to revenge, and she considers following in Léon’s footsteps.
description_for_label: Léon, the top hit man in New York, has earned a rep as an effective “cleaner”. But when his next-door neighbors are wiped out by a loose-cannon DEA agent, he becomes the unwilling custodian of 12-year-old Mathilda. Before long, Mathilda’s thoughts turn to revenge, and she considers following in Léon’s footsteps.

results.title: Lemonade
results.creator_credit: Beyoncé, Mark Romanek, Jonas Åkerlund, Kahlil Joseph and Hannah Beachler
results.brief_description: The second “visual album” (a collection of short films) by Beyoncé, this time around she takes a piercing look at racial issues and feminist concepts through a sexualized, satirical, and solemn tone.

constellations_other.name: Cleverman
constellations_other.description: Cleverman is dystopian sci-fi with a difference. With a predominantly Indigenous cast and senior crew, the series explores Aboriginal origin stories in a contemporary context, while examining themes of class, racism and power.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Beyoncé, Mark Romanek, Jonas Åkerlund, Kahlil Joseph and Hannah Beachler
results.description: The second “visual album” (a collection of short films) by Beyoncé, this time around she takes a piercing look at racial issues and feminist concepts through a sexualized, satirical, and solemn tone.

results.title: Lassie
results.brief_description:
Lassie is an American television series that follows the adventures of a female Rough Collie dog named Lassie and her companions, human and animal. The show was the creation of producer Robert Maxwell and animal trainer Rudd Weatherwax and was televised from September 12, 1954, to March 24, 1973. One of the longest-running series on television, the show chalked up seventeen seasons on CBS before entering first-run syndication for its final two seasons. Initially filmed in black and white, the show transitioned to color in 1965.

The show’s first ten seasons follow Lassie’s adventures in a small farming community. Fictional eleven-year-old Jeff Miller, his mother, and his grandfather are Lassie’s first human companions until seven-year-old Timmy Martin and his adoptive parents take over in the fourth season. When Lassie’s exploits on the farm end in the eleventh season, she finds new adventures in the wilderness with a succession of United States Forest Service Rangers. After traveling without human leads for a year, Lassie finally settles at a children’s home for her final two syndicated seasons.

Lassie received critical favor at its debut and won two Emmy Awards in its first years. Stars Jan Clayton and June Lockhart were nominated for Emmys. Merchandise produced during the show’s run included books, a Halloween costume, clothing, toys, and other items. Campbell’s Soup, the show’s lifelong sponsor, offered two premiums, and distributed thousands to fans. A multi-part episode was edited into the feature film Lassie’s Great Adventure and released in August 1963. In 1989, the television series The New Lassie brought Lassie star Jon Provost back to television as Steve McCullough. Selected episodes have been released to DVD.

results.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
results.headline_credit: Cambodia, Germany, Japan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2001
results.brief_description: Angelina Jolie stars as the iconic videogame character Lara Croft in this early 2000s adaptation.

constellations_other.name: Representation of women in videogames
constellations_other.description: Ms Pac-Man is the first famous female game protagonist, but let's face it – she's just Pac-Man with a bow. This Constellation looks at the history of female representation in videogames.

results.headline_credit_for_label: Cambodia, Germany, Japan, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2001
results.description: English aristocrat Lara Croft is skilled in hand-to-hand combat and in the middle of a battle with a secret society. The shapely archaeologist moonlights as a tomb raider to recover lost antiquities and meets her match in the evil Powell, who’s in search of a powerful relic.
description_for_label: English aristocrat Lara Croft is skilled in hand-to-hand combat and in the middle of a battle with a secret society. The shapely archaeologist moonlights as a tomb raider to recover lost antiquities and meets her match in the evil Powell, who’s in search of a powerful relic.

results.title: Land Without Bread
results.brief_description: A surrealistic documentary portrait of the region of Las Hurdes, a remote region of Spain where civilisation has barely developed, showing how the local peasants try to survive without even the most basic utilities and skills.

constellations_other.name: Reconstructing reality
constellations_other.description: While documentary pertains to be about the truth, many filmmakers and artists have used ingenious reconstructions to represent an abstracted honesty.

results.description: An exploration —manipulated and staged— of life in Las Hurdes, in the province of Cáceres, in Extremadura, Spain, as it was in 1932. Insalubrity, misery and lack of opportunities provoke the emigration of young people and the solitude of those who remain in the desolation of one of the poorest and least developed Spanish regions at that time. (Silent short, voiced in 1937 and 1996.)
description_for_label: An exploration —manipulated and staged— of life in Las Hurdes, in the province of Cáceres, in Extremadura, Spain, as it was in 1932. Insalubrity, misery and lack of opportunities provoke the emigration of young people and the solitude of those who remain in the desolation of one of the poorest and least developed Spanish regions at that time. (Silent short, voiced in 1937 and 1996.)

results.title: Lady in the Lake
results.brief_description: Private detective Philip Marlowe is asked by a publishing executive, Adrienne Fromsett, to locate the wife of her boss, publisher Derace Kingsby. Earlier she had sent her husband a telegram saying she was heading to Mexico to marry Chris Lavery. However Kingsby had recently seen Lavery in the neighbouring Bay City. Marlowe pursues his investigation at the Kingsby’s lakeside cottage.

results.title: Labyrinth
results.creator_credit: Lucasfilm Ltd., Henson Organisation and Elliot Scott
results.headline_credit: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
results.brief_description: When teen Sarah is forced to babysit Toby, her baby stepbrother, she summons Jareth the Goblin King to take him away. When he is actually kidnapped, Sarah is given just thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue him.

constellations_other.name: Blizzard, Bowie and the Bonets
constellations_other.description: Overwatch is the beginning of some surprising connections in this Constellation that explores videogame movies, cartoons, and music docos and shows.

constellations_other.name: Webwurlds
constellations_other.description: Jess Johnson and Simon Ward's work is inspired by science fiction and fantasy. Johnson's hand-drawn illustrations are heavily detailed with geometric patterns and incorporate anthropomorphic characters amongst architectural environments in immersive other worlds.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Lucasfilm Ltd., Henson Organisation and Elliot Scott
results.headline_credit_for_label: United Kingdom and United States of America, 1986
results.description: When teen Sarah is forced to babysit Toby, her baby stepbrother, she summons Jareth the Goblin King to take him away. When he is actually kidnapped, Sarah is given just thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue him.
description_for_label: When teen Sarah is forced to babysit Toby, her baby stepbrother, she summons Jareth the Goblin King to take him away. When he is actually kidnapped, Sarah is given just thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue him.

results.title: La Pointe-Courte
results.brief_description: A penetrating study of a marriage on the rocks, set against the backdrop of a small Mediterranean fishing village. Both a stylized depiction of the complicated relationship between a married couple and a documentary-like look at the daily struggles of the inhabitants of Sète in the South of France.

constellations_other.name: All about Agnes
constellations_other.description: Belgian director Agnes Varda was the only female director in the French New Wave movement and is known for her long career across influential documentary and dramas, and for her trademark humour, curiosity and insight.

results.description: A penetrating study of a marriage on the rocks, set against the backdrop of a small Mediterranean fishing village. Both a stylized depiction of the complicated relationship between a married couple and a documentary-like look at the daily struggles of the inhabitants of Sète in the South of France.
description_for_label: A penetrating study of a marriage on the rocks, set against the backdrop of a small Mediterranean fishing village. Both a stylized depiction of the complicated relationship between a married couple and a documentary-like look at the daily struggles of the inhabitants of Sète in the South of France.

results.title: La La Land
results.brief_description: Two star-crossed lovers chat their way to success through the cut-throat Hollywood industry in this award-winning musical from Damien Chazelle starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling.

constellations_other.name: Sound and Hollywood
constellations_other.description: The impact of sound on Tinsel Town stretches from the beginning of cinema to recent award-winners, as well as the biggest band in K-Pop.

results.description: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.
description_for_label: Mia, an aspiring actress, serves lattes to movie stars in between auditions and Sebastian, a jazz musician, scrapes by playing cocktail party gigs in dingy bars, but as success mounts they are faced with decisions that begin to fray the fragile fabric of their love affair, and the dreams they worked so hard to maintain in each other threaten to rip them apart.
